#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define LL long long
//LL pwer(LL n)
//{if(n==0)
//return 1;
//    if(n==1)
//    return 2;
//if(n%2==0)
//return pwer(n/2)*pwer(n/2);
//n--;
//return 2*pwer(n/2)*pwer(n/2);
//}
int main()
{LL k,n;
cin>>k;
while(k--)
{cin>>n;
if(n>23)
    cout<<8388607<<endl;
else
{    LL tmp=1<<(n-1);
cout<<(tmp*(n*n-n+2)-1)%8388608<<endl;
}
}
return 0;
}
